summary: This is a forwarded email chain from December 2018, containing a 2016 email discussing Daniel Siad, who is described by Jean Luc Brunel as a recruiter of girls and women for Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes Siad's contact information.

persons.name: Daniel Siad
persons.context: Described by Jean Luc Brunel as a 'scour or recruiter of girls and/or women for J. Epstein' in an email from 2016.

persons.name: Jean Luc Brunel
persons.role: Modeling agency owner, associate of Epstein
persons.context: The source who describes Daniel Siad as a recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein in the forwarded email.

persons.name: Stan Pottinge
persons.context: The sender of the 2016 email forwarding Jean Luc Brunel's information about Daniel Siad.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: The individual for whom Daniel Siad is alleged to recruit girls and women.

connections.description: Brunel is the source providing contact information and describing Siad's alleged activities.
Siad is described as a recruiter of girls and women for Epstein.
Brunel is providing information about an alleged recruiter for Epstein.

events.title: Email about Daniel Siad
events.description: Stan Pottinge forwards an email describing Daniel Siad as a recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein, based on information from Jean Luc Brunel.

events.title: Email forwarded
events.description: The 2016 email chain is forwarded again, indicating ongoing interest or investigation into the allegations.

keyFacts: Jean Luc Brunel describes Daniel Siad as a 'scour or recruiter of girls and/or women for J. Epstein'.
Contact information for Daniel Siad was being circulated via email in 2016.
The email chain was forwarded again in December 2018, suggesting the information remained relevant.
The document directly links an alleged recruiter (Siad) to the Epstein sex trafficking operation through Brunel's testimony.
